meanings.definition: A small, wingless insect belonging to the order Psocoptera.
meanings.sent1: I found a psocid crawling on the wall.
meanings.sent2: Psocids are commonly found in damp areas like basements.
meanings.sent3: The psocid seemed to be on a mission to explore every nook and cranny.
meanings.sent4: The psocid moved with the stealth of a tiny ninja.
meanings.sent5: The tiny psocid looked like a speck of dust until it moved.

meanings.sent1: The researcher studied the psocid behavior in detail.
meanings.sent2: Psocid habitats are carefully monitored for research purposes.
meanings.sent3: The psocid party was the talk of the insect community.
meanings.sent4: Her psocid-like curiosity led her to explore new territories.
meanings.sent5: The psocid influence could be seen in the intricate insect artwork.
